name: byteclub-landing-page
description: A landing page for our upcoming app, Byte Club.

scripts.start: bun run client:build && bun run server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "bun run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && bun run client:dev"
scripts.server: cd server && bun run start && cd ..
scripts.install: cd server && bun install && cd ../client && bun install
